tribu: ad boc· novies propter syllabam aueipitem pedem definire
nou potui. Habent iambum versus bi: Ι 10515 45 0155575 005115

92535 185 ΧΙ 015105 98515 XII 87555 denique tribrachyn bi versuta
I 4 et III 93512. Postremo hia locist III 20525 4759 5 VII 75105
26585 VIII 445135 XI 985205 XII 325105 195 05545 aum prior
syllaba anceps sit, dubium est utrum spondeus an iambus exstet.
Reliqui versus spondeum babent.

Iu secunda sede insunt 728 iambi, 01 tribu, 1 spondeus. At-
que tribrachyn in his versibus inveni: 161535 75 60595 8455 5
89555 96512 5 ΙΙ 11515 105 05525 55 ΙΠ20515 65 215 22525 40515
58535 05 255 205 205 64515 82545 115 185 93575 115 125185225 245
